articles.author: Sky Sports
articles.title: Solheim Cup: Ireland's Leona Maguire named among Catriona Matthew's picks for Team Europe - Sky Sports
articles.description: Leona Maguire will become the first Irish player to represent Team Europe in the Solheim Cup after being named as one of Catriona Matthew’s six captain’s picks.
articles.content:
Catriona Matthew names her six captain's picks for the European team ahead of the defence of their title at next month's Solheim Cup.

articles.title: 'The best one' - Chelsea's Lukaku relishes goal on Premier League return - SuperSport
articles.description: Chelsea striker Romelu Lukaku said his goal in Sunday's 2-0 win over London rivals Arsenal, the Belgium international's first match back with the European champions.

articles.author: Kevin Shalvey
articles.title: NASA says its Hubble telescope captured a spiral galaxy that's as bright as a jewel and 68 million light-years from Earth - Yahoo News
articles.description: The European and US space agencies said a photo snapped by the Hubble was of a galaxy in the Fornax constellation, about 68 million light-years away.
articles.content:
The Hubble Space Telescope captured an image of a "jewel-bright" spiral galaxy, which is 68 million light-years from Earth.
